kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Get Substring
kw.doc: Returns a substring from ``start`` index to ``end`` index.

kw.name: Set Variable If
kw.doc: Sets variable based on the given condition.

kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Expect Error
kw.doc: Runs the keyword and checks that the expected error occurred.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Fail
kw.doc: Fails the test with the given message and optionally alters its tags.

kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return
kw.doc: Runs the specified keyword and returns from the enclosing user keyword.

kw.doc: Runs the given command in the system and returns the RC and output.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
